          <title>
            <string language="es">Fracciones</string>
            <string language="en">Fractions</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Brüche</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Fractions</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Frações</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Frazioni</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μέρη</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">unidad didáctica que desarrolla mediante simulaciones las fracciones. Se estudian todas las operaciones relacionadas con fracciones: simplificación, suma, resta, producto, división.</string>
            <string language="en">teaching unit which uses simulations to explain fractions, studying all the operations related to fractions: addition, subtraction, product and division.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">resta</string>
            <string language="en">subtraction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">fracciones</string>
            <string language="en">fractions</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">división</string>
            <string language="en">division</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">producto</string>
            <string language="en">product</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">operaciones</string>
            <string language="en">operations</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">suma</string>
            <string language="en">addition</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">simplificación</string>
            <string language="en">simplification</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">números</string>
            <string language="en">numbers</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">unterrichtende Maßeinheit, welche 
Gebrauchsimulationen, die Brüche, alle Operationen studierend zu 
erklären auf Brüchen in Verbindung stand: Hinzufügung, Abzug,
Produkt und Abteilung.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">unité d'enseignement quelles simulations 
d'utilisations expliquer des fractions, étudiant toutes les 
exécutions a associées aux fractions : ajout, soustraction, 
produit et division.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">unidade ensinando que simulações dos usos 
explicar as frações, estudando todas as operações relacionou às 
frações: adição, subtração, produto e divisão.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">unità d'istruzione quali simulazioni di usi 
spiegare le frazioni, studianti tutti i funzionamenti ha collegato 
alle frazioni: aggiunta, sottrazione, prodotto e divisione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">η μονάδα διδασκαλίας που χρησιμοποιεί τις 
προσομοιώσεις για να εξηγήσει τα μέρη, που μελετούν όλες τις 
διαδικασίες αφορούσε τα μέρη: προσθήκη, αφαίρεση, προϊόν 
και τμήμα.</string>
          </description>
